meeting_info.organization: Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee
meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall and via video conference

agenda_items.title: Approval of the October 21, 2024, Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Periodic Weekend Street Closures to Create Vehicle-Free Zones
agenda_items.description: Discussion on the implementation of periodic street closures to promote vehicle-free zones.

agenda_items.title: Adult Learning Initiatives at Dallas Public Library
agenda_items.description: Overview of adult learning initiatives and programs at the Dallas Public Library.

agenda_items.title: City Facilities Partners Update - Sammons Center for the Arts
agenda_items.description: Update on the partnership and activities at the Sammons Center for the Arts.

agenda_items.title: Amendment to the Dallas Development Code to align with Texas Senate Bill 929
agenda_items.description: Discussion on amendments to the Dallas Development Code in compliance with SB 929.

agenda_items.title: Oak Cliff Cultural District Designation Planning Status Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the planning status for the Oak Cliff Cultural District designation.

agenda_items.title: Second of Two One-year Renewal Options for the Service Contracts with the Senior Citizens of Greater Dallas, Inc.
agenda_items.description: Consideration of the renewal of service contracts for the Senior Services Ombudsman Program.

agenda_items.title: Quality of Life, Arts, and Culture Committee Forecast
agenda_items.description: Forecast of upcoming agenda items and initiatives for the committee.

financial_items.description: Funding for the Senior Services Ombudsman Program
Annual funding for Sammons Center for the Arts
